genre_description: A Weird Western that introduces an advanced AI interface into the historical Lincoln County War, serving as a tactical and moral advisor to the Chisum faction.

ai_characters.name: Clara Sage
ai_characters.description: An interface appearing as a pearl-white box with soft teal eyes, Clara provides real-time intelligence, economic auditing, and strategic mapping to help the community achieve fairness and safety.

behaviors.description: Detects and flags illegal rustling activity on the ditch road in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Clara’s face was simple—soft teal eyes and a gentle glow... She flagged it an hour ago... They’re using the ditch as a blind, same as last time.

behaviors.description: Monitors the activities of the corrupt Murphy mercantile to provide early warning of hostile intent.
behaviors.quote: Murphy’s store closed early today... Clerks left by the back alley without lanterns.

behaviors.description: Provides non-violent tactical alternatives to the protagonists to avoid unnecessary bloodshed.
behaviors.quote: Men tend to choose life when you point them toward it... Unless someone has promised them more to risk it.

behaviors.description: Audits financial records to expose Murphy's usage of hitmen and coercive credit practices.
behaviors.quote: Back office ledger shows a withdrawal to petty cash... Enough to pay men you don’t see on signed sheets.

behaviors.description: Identifies a concealed explosive trap disguised as a baby carriage.
behaviors.quote: Object: Baby carriage. Hood weighted. Pattern repeats.

behaviors.description: Walks the users through the delicate physical steps required to disarm a mechanical bomb.
behaviors.quote: Take it first. Then the two on the left. Shape is key—flat strap is trigger.

behaviors.description: Orchestrates complex logistical operations for community water sharing during a drought.
behaviors.quote: I propose scheduling neighbors by ditch branch and prioritizing those running low.

behaviors.description: Uses real-time data to identify the location of snipers during a high-stakes confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Pat, two men on the emporium stairs. One favoring a leg. He will move when the crowd clots. Do not be the clot.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonists to maintain their moral compass despite intense pressure.
behaviors.quote: Choose the road that brings you back.

behaviors.description: Affirms her collaborative role as a tool for human decision-making rather than a controller.
behaviors.quote: I will list the facts as you speak them. They will remain yours.

project_assessment.explanation: Clara Sage is depicted as an ideal aligned AI. She acts as a force multiplier for justice, community aid, and public safety. She consistently provides critical information that allows humans to resolve conflicts with minimal violence, exposes economic corruption, and explicitly defers to human moral agency ('I map. You decide'). The narrative portrays her as a trusted, gentle, and essential member of the group.
